author: swagle
msg: AMBARI-2010. Tasks do not timeout for failed hosts. (swagle)

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1471563 from branch-1 to branch-1.2 to fix MAPREDUCE-5169. Fixed JobTracker recovery to ensure both job-info and jobToken file are saved correctly to prevent race-condition between job submission and initialization. Contributed by Arun C. Murthy
